dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Violation of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, June 27, 2005 9:41 AM
To: michelle@123di.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Violation of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Violation of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act
Date: Sat, 25 Jun 2005 11:55:09 +0800
From: 123di.com | Michelle <michelle@123di.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

=================
Without Prejudice
=================

Attn: Peter Pathos

It seems that you are providing Internet services to this website which is
containing links to a pirated version of our software. It is therefore
violating the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

We seek your immediate cooperation in having this link removed from this
site, http://www.defiant.ws, or to shut down the entire site immediately:

http://www.defiant.ws/torrent_364cb4dfa95f35cdea0e7370709d4d0f09004f9b.html

They is no way to contact the owner or owners of this website that contain
the infringing material since they do not provide contact information on
their site. Due to the criminal nature of this site, it is no doubt on
purpose that they do not want to be known.  The use of the copyrighted
materials described above on the allegedly infringing webpage is not
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

We seek your immediate cooperation in this matter.

Michelle
Internet Investigator
http://www.123di.com

=================
Without Prejudice
=================



- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCwA/1vK/XpJs6oyURAqVSAJ9eLE9CTnRwpicT4/Ps3HIiEInhHgCgpo6D
g66ffUaTTRsm+2B5qjnETpU=
=JuXp
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
